metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9051 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
libav before 12.1 is vulnerable to an invalid read of size 1 due to NULLpointer dereferencing in the nsv_read_chunk function inlibavformat/nsvdec.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9051` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libav-tools - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavcodec-extra - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavcodec-extra57 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavcodec57 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavdevice57 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavfilter-extra - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavfilter-extra6 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavfilter6 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavformat57 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavresample3 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libavutil55 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libpostproc54 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libswresample2 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
libswscale4 - 7:3.2.4-1build4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:3.2.4-1build4').
